ChangeList.Description: Added the [approval](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/approval?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and related methods. Use this method in Azure AD Entitlement Management to retrieve approval objects.

Added the [approvalStage](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/approvalstage?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource and related methods. Use this method in Azure AD Entitlement Management to manage approval stages for an approval object.
Added the **accessPackageAssignmentApprovals** relationship to the [entitlementManagement](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/entitlementmanagement?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
